entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
